sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-app id="neo">
		<v-navigation-drawer
		  v-model="drawer"
		  app
		>
			<Tree
			  :items="treeData"
			/>
		</v-navigation-drawer>
		<v-app-bar app>
			<v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
			
			<v-toolbar-title>Neomanager</v-toolbar-title>
			
			<v-spacer></v-spacer>
			
			<v-btn icon>
				<v-icon>mdi-magnify</v-icon>
			</v-btn>
			
			<v-btn icon>
				<v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
			</v-btn>
			
			<template v-slot:extension>
				<v-tabs
				  v-model="tab"
				  align-with-title
				>
					<v-tabs-slider color="yellow"></v-tabs-slider>
					
					<v-tab
					  v-for="item in navs"
					  :key="item.path"
					  :to="item.path"
					>
						{{ item.name }}
					</v-tab>
				</v-tabs>
			</template>
		</v-app-bar>
		
		<v-main>
			<router-view/>
		</v-main>
	</v-app>
</template>

<script>
//import Nav from './views/Nav.vue'
import Tree from './components/Tree.vue'
import EventBus from '@/EventBus.js'
import grpList from '@/assets/data/grp.json'


export default {
	name: 'App',
	
	components: {
	    //Nav,
	    Tree,
	},
	
	data: () => ({
		drawer: null,
		tab: null,
		navs: [
			{ id: 1, name: '알림현황', path: 'dashboard' },
			{ id: 8, name: '장비정보', path: 'boxstate' },
			{ id: 2, name: '그룹관리', path: 'grp' },
			{ id: 3, name: '알람로그', path: 'alm' },
			{ id: 4, name: '매니저설정', path: 'mng' },
			{ id: 5, name: '일괄등록', path: 'batch' },
			{ id: 6, name: '잠김관리자', path: 'lock' },
			{ id: 7, name: '장비로그', path: 'log' },
		],
		treeData: [],
		def_tree_item: {
			id: 0,
			bname: '',
			slave: 0,
			pid: 0,
			file: 'success',
		},
	}),

	methods: {
		readFile: function(list) {
			console.log(list);
			var max_id = list.max_id;
			var data = [];

			for(var k in list) {
				if(k != 'max_id') {
					console.log(list[k]);
				}
			}
		},
		saveFile: function() {
			var data = JSON.stringify(this.treeData)
			window.localStorage.setItem('arr', data);
		},
	},

	created() {
		console.log(grpList);
		this.readFile(grpList);
		EventBus.$on('tree_update', (type, val) => {
			console.log(type);
			console.log(val);
		});
	}
};
</script>

<style>
#neo .v-main {
	/* padding: 20px !important; */
}
</style>
